title: Alien Sightings in India: Do We Have Any Stories to Share?
selftext:
With all the recent buzz about aliens in Mexico, I couldn't help but wonder if we have any similar stories right here in India.

Ref : https://www.marca.com/en/lifestyle/world-news/2023/09/13/65011a37ca4741e5678b4580.html
comments: The chances of it being a "God Avatar" sighting even when an actual alien shows up in India are very high.
this is an extremely dubious report, imo, more specifically, the line " DNA evidence using radioactive dating" Is damn sus
Proof that aliens doesnâ€™t exist is that this region, South Asia, has about 30% of world population yet their sightings here is almost nonexistent.

Okay I actually read a couple of articles about this event instead of merely the headline like most people and what's worth noting is that the corpses have been examined  by merely one institution, namely National Autonomous University of Mexico, so obviously more thorough and widespread scientific investigation of the corpses is warranted before taking this news seriously.
Ya there is some fishy stuff about that.
